description: This file defines a generic linked list data structure with methods for adding, removing, retrieving, and measuring the size of elements. It includes an internal Node class and a companion object to find the tail node.

classes.name: LinkedList
classes.description: A singly linked list class with methods to add, remove, get elements, and determine its size.

classes.name: Node
classes.description: Internal class representing a node in the linked list, holding a String data and a reference to the next node.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds an element to the end of the linked list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the specified element from the linked list, returns true if successful.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in the linked list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at the specified index.

methods.name: unlink
methods.description: Internal method to unlink a node from the list.
